Faith Ringgold (amụrụ n'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1930 na Harlem, New York City ) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe, onye edemede, onye na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi, na onye na-ese ihe, nke a maara nke ọma maka akụkọ akụkọ ya.

A mụrụ Faith Ringgold nke ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 8, n'afọ1930, na Harlem Hospital, New York City.: 24 Nne na nna ya, Andrew Louis Jones na Willi Posey Jones, bụ ụmụ nke ezinụlọ ndị na-arụ ọrụ nke Great Migration chụpụrụ. Nne Ringgold bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na nna ya, yana ịrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ, bụ onye na-akọ akụkọ. Ha zụlitere ya na gburugburu ebe obibi nke gbara ya ume ịmepụta ihe

Mgbe Harlem Renaissance gasịrị, ụlọ Ringgold mgbe ọ bụ nwata na Harlem gbara gburugburu site na ihe ngosi nka na-aga nke ọma - ebe ndị dị ka Duke Ellington na Langston Hughes bi n'akụkụ nkuku.: 27 Enyi nwata ya, Sonny Rollins, onye ga-etolite bụrụ onye egwu jazz a ma ama, na-agakarị ezinụlọ ya ma na-eme saxofon na nnọkọ ha: 28 N'ihi ụkwara ume ọkụ ya na-adịghị ala ala, Ringgold nyochara nka ọhụụ dị ka nnukwu ntụrụndụ site na nkwado nke nne ya, na-anwalekarị crayons dị ka nwa agbọghọ: 24 Ọ mụtakwara otú e si akwa na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ okike site n'aka nne ya. Ringgold na-ekwusi ike na n'agbanyeghị nzụlite ya na Harlem nke oge nnukwu ịda mbà n'obi, 'nke a apụtaghị na [ọ] dara ogbenye ma bụrụ onye a na-emegbu emegbu' - 'e chebere ya pụọ na mmegbu ma nwee ezinụlọ na-ahụ n'anya gbara ya gburugburu.': 24 Site na mmetụta ndị a niile jikọtara ọnụ, ndị mmadụ, uri, na egwu ọ nwetara na nwata ya, yana ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, mmekọahụ, na nkewa ọ na-emeso na ndụ ya kwa ụbọchị metụtara ihe osise Ringgold n'ọdịnihu nke ukwuu. : 9
